Summary: I noticed a dim light in the sky fly across the sky from the east heading west extremly fast i called my girlfriend out to verify it when she verified it the light incressed dramadically twice and vanished
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was saturday night was very sleepy but hungry decided to grill outside and actually thought to myself mabye ill see something in the sky and it will make all the work grilling worth while . Well i did I noticed a dim light much dimmer than the stars moving so fast out of the east that I called my girlfriend outside so I could have a second opinion I was very exited ! She came out back I had to point it out by blocking the flood light from her eyes with my hand like a horse blind once I had blocked out the flood light she noticed it we agreed on both having a visual on it it and then it glowed extremly bright twice and vanished . I saw some thing similar in Houston Texas in 02 or 03 Same sort of thing had a feeling if I went outside i might see something went out side up on a roof off in the distance a saw a very very bright light head twards me said holy smokes out load to my suprise ther was someone else on the roof who repeted it I said do you see that ? The person said yes and at that moment The light flared and shot straight up and disapeared into sky ! This sighting is what keened my eye to my last sighting ! I seriously dont think these were shooting stars or satilites because they were flying over the land in a straight level line and then when I confirm with others the visual they disapare with a flash . I dont know what these things were but I thought it quite strange it should happen twice !
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fall River
There were no other sightings in Fall River on or around June 2nd 2007
